post.summary: Shopify Sends an account invite to a customer.
post.description:
Payload data:

      to: email address (optional),
      from : from email (optional),
      subject: email subject (optional),
      message: email message body (optional),
      bcc : bcc emails array (optional)

Payload data:
      password: required
      password_confirmation: required

payload:
      email,
      send_receipt: true/false,
      items: {
      variant_id,
      quantity
      }

put.description:
payload data:

      note :  test note ,
      email :  test@updateemail.com ,
      phone :  +15142546016 ,
      tags :  test tags ,
      shipping_address : {
      first_name :  Bob ,
      last_name :  Norman ,
      phone :  +15142546016 ,
      address1 :  Chestnut1 Street1 92 ,
      address2 :  Chestnut2 Street2 92 ,
      city :  Louisville ,
      province :  Kentucky ,
      zip :  40202 ,
      country :  United States
      }
